name: Fuller Creek
description:
Introduction

The R rating is for the crack formed along the left side of the bottom half of the first rappel. The entire rappel is down a narrow angled crack and the flow has carved out a crack deep on canyon left. This crack could pose an entrapment issue. While it is extremely short on it's own, a nice route to combine with Upper Ice Lake Creek.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
